name: TRACES 3D Scene
summary: A TRACE file is a 3D object or animation project created in Traces, an early 3D modeling and animation application. It contains data used to render and animate a 3D object. TRACE files cannot be opened in programs other than Traces.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Can be opened only in Traces using an Amiga emulator

macos.display_name: Can be opened only in Traces using an Amiga emulator

linux.display_name: Can be opened only in Traces using an Amiga emulator
